analyzeResult.content:
1
BIOGRAPHIC SKETCH
Afaf Absood, Ph.D., Co-Investigator - d/o/b 11/13/45
Alexandria University, Egypt - B.S., 1966 - Agriculture (Pomology) M.S., 1972 - Chemistry
Emory University, Atlanta, Georgia - Lund University, Lund Sweden - Ph.D., 1991 - Pharmacology
Instructor, Fruit Research Institute, Cairo, Egypt ('66-'70); Research Assistant, Biochemistry Department, Emory University School of Medicine, Atlanta, Georgia ('72-'73); Research Assistant, Div. of Clinical Pharmacology, Dept. of Medicine, Emory University School of Medicine, Atlanta, Georgia ('75-'77); Research Assistant, Biochemistry Department, Emory University School of Medicine, Atlanta, Georgia (2/77-2/78); Forensic Toxicologist, Georgia Bureau of Investigation Crime Lab., Atlanta, Georgia (2/78-8/79); Lecturer in Pharmacology, Dept. of Pharmacology, College of Medicine and Medical Science, King Faisal University, Dammam, Saudi-Arabia (9/79-3/87); Visiting Scholar, Dept. of Medicine, University of Illinois at Chicago (3/91-9/91); Research Scientist, Department of Medicine, SUNY at Stony Brook, NY (10/91-present).
AWARDS: University of Alexandria Award for six months training in the Agriculture Research Station, Lausanne, Switzerland ('65), University of Alexandria Financial Award for being an outstanding student ('65-'66), Research Assistantship, Chemistry Dept., Emory University, Atlanta, Georgia ('70-'72), Medical Faculty Fellowship, Univ. of Lund, Sweden (88-'91). PUBLICATIONS:
1. Absood, A.H., Tutunji, M.S., Hsu, .Y, and Clever, H.L .; The density and enthalpy of mixing of solutions of acetonitrile and of dimethyl sulfoxide with several aromatic hydrocarbons. J. Chem. Eng. Data 21:304-308, 1976.
2. Naguib, M., Famewo, C.E., and Absood, A .: Pharmacokinetics of meperidine in spinal anesthesia. Can. Anaesth. Soc. J. 33:162-166, 1986.
3. El Mouzan, M.I., Al Freihi, H.M., Yong, M.S., Jaccarini, A., Abdulcader, Z., Ballal, S.G., El Seed Absood, A.G .: Problems in organizing therapeutic drug monitoring: A practical experience in the Eastern Province. Saudi Medical Journal 8:605-612, 1987.
4. Naguib, M., Farag, H., Absood, G .: Pharmacokinetic profile of epidural meperidine with and without dextran 70. Clin. Pharmacol. Ther, 43:407-411, 1988.
5. Tutunji, M.S., Absood, A.H. and Clever, H.L .: Excess Gibbs energy of mixing and refractive index of binary solutions of acetonitrile and of dimethylsulfoxide with several aromatic hydrocarbons. Thermochimica Acta 138: 19-24, 1989.
6. Grunditz, T., Persson, P., Hakanson, R., Absood, A., Bottcher, G., Kerup, C., and Sundler, F .: Helodermin-like peptides in thyroid C cells: Stimulation of thyroid hormone secretion and suppression of calcium incorporation into bone. Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA 86:1357-1361, 1989.
7. Bjartell, A., Persson, P., Absood, A., Sundler, F., and Håkanson, R .: Helodermin-like peptides in noradrenaline cells of adrenal medulla. Regul. Peptides 26:27-34, 1989.
8. El-Munshid, H.A., Dissanayake, A.A., Absood, A., Al-Quorain, A., Al-Breiki, H., and Wosornu, L .: Smoking elevates fasting serum group I pepsinogen level in Saudi patients with duodenal ulcer. Annals Saudi Medicine 10:470-471, 1990.
9. Luts, A., Uddman, R., Absood, A., Hakanson, R., and Sundler, F .: Chemical coding of endocrine cells of the airways: presence of helodermin-like peptides. Cell Tiss. Res. 265:425- 433, 1991.
10. Naguib, M., Abdulatif, M., and Absood, A. Comparative effects of pipecuronium and tubocurarine on plasma concentrations of histamine in humans. Brit. J. Anaesth. 67:320-322, 1991.
11. Uddman, R., Luts, A. Absood, A., Arimura, A., Ekelund, M., Desai, H., Håkanson, R., Hambreaus, G., and Sundler, F .: PACAP, a VIP-like peptide, in neurons of the esophagus. Regul. Peptides 36:415-422, 1991.
12. Absood, A., Ekblad, E., Hakanson, R., and Sundler, F .: Helospectin-like peptides in the gastrointestinal tract. Immunocytochemical localization and immunochemical characterization. Neuroscience 46:431-438, 1992.
13. Sundler, F., Ekblad, E., Absood, A., Håkanson, R,, Koves, K. and Arimura, A .: Pituitary adenylate cyclase activating peptide (PACAP). A novel VIP-like neuropeptide in the gut. Neuroscience 46:439-454, 1992.
